alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 3:28PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Juab and southwestern Utah Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 327 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elberta, or 18 miles west of Payson, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elberta, Goshen and Eureka. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 139 and 153. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
